author: NiharSaha
body:
#### PR description:
Central DQM migration
campaign for drop type specs for three Validation packages viz EcalClusters, EcalHits and EventGenerator following 
https://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html#6--packaging-rules-1

Update the safer syntax for existing parameter : (1) drop type specifications where the original parameter exists. (2) using "clone" instead of "deepcopy" (3) move all parameter inside the clone.

#### PR validation:
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
NA
title: Drop type specs for Validation/EcalClusters, Validation/EcalHits and Validation/EventGenerator
